comments.body:
Add here a line with:

```yaml
script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@build:
  noarch_python: True
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

comments.body: Please add `license_file: LICENSE` so as to include the license in the `conda` package.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/hgrecco/pyvisa-py
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Python VISA bindings for GPIB, RS232, and USB instruments'
